items.name: Ghoul Refuge
craftedMods: Gain 8% of Cold Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons an Ancestor Totem which attacks enemies with a powerful slam while you're near it. Being near it grants you more melee damage. Requires a Melee Weapon or Unarmed.
explicitMods: Summons a Totem which uses this Skill
18% more Melee Damage while Totem is Active
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons an Ancestor Totem which attacks enemies with melee strikes while you're near it. Being near it grants you more attack speed. Requires a Melee Weapon or Unarmed.
explicitMods: Summons a Totem which uses this Skill
20% more Attack Speed while Totem is Active
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills which summon totems.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have +2 to maximum number of Summoned Totems
Supported Skills Summon two Totems instead of one
Supported Skills have 23% increased Totem Placement speed
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Goldwyrm
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Flame Golem that grants you increased Damage. The Flame Golem can use a fire spray, a wave of fire damage, and an explosive arcing projectile.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff which can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

70% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take 2209 Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. If dual wielding attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one hit. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
explicitMods: When Dual Wielding, Deals 75% Damage from each Weapon combined
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 16% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
You and nearby allies gain 20% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 31% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 31% increased Attack Speed
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.

items.name: Cinderswallow Urn
explicitMods: Recharges 5 Charges when you Consume an Ignited corpse
Regenerate 3% of Life per second during Effect
Enemies Ignited by you during Effect take 10% increased Damage
Recover 2% of Energy Shield when you Kill an Enemy during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A controlled burn is sometimes necessary for new life.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the level of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.typeLine: Surgeon's Quicksilver Flask of the Dove
explicitMods: 31% chance to gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: 29% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

items.name: Heatshiver
enchantMods: Hatred has 30% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency
implicitMods: Socketed Skill Gems get a 90% Cost & Reservation Multiplier
explicitMods: Gain 1% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1% Chill Effect on Enemy
Gain 100% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Give of your heated passions.
Give of your cold resolve.
You will be repaid.

items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.
